page.title: 19LIFE IN STONNALL.
page.content: Several people were interviewed as to why they moved in to the village. One new resident replied as follows: "After moving from Pelsall I am aware of the quiet village atmosphere and identity of Stonnall. It has not been overdeveloped and this is what appealed to me. It is well situated for shopping, being near to Birmingham, Lichfield and Sutton Coldfield. I enjoy the lovely walks close at hand." Other people questioned voiced similar opinions, adding that Stonnall is a friendly place. Few criticisms were made, although it became apparent that infrequent bus services and few amenities caused problems. One 9 year old boy replied to the question, What do you think of Stonnall? by saying"It is nice but the school is a long way down the road."
